text: Hrothyogg the feared maneater, collector of tolls or bringer of death.
To survive in the rugged valleys, the Deathtoll tribe had to adapt and hunt the most cunning of prey
Hrothyogg know's the benefits of keeping his tribe fed, as insatiable their appetite may be.
One of the most infamous and refered maneaters alive, Hrothyogg is as popular as he is feared among other warlords.
All these contracts have made Hrothyogg quite the negotiator, for an Orge - that is.
Hack' em! Slash' em! Put them in our stew!
No finer stew is known to Ogre bellies than Hrothyogg's stew, it's ingredients a secret.
None pass through the rugged mountains seperating Ind and Cathay without paying the ultimate toll.
No finer stew is known to Ogre bellies than Hrothyogg's stew, it's ingredients a secret.
Hrothyogg the feared maneater, collector of tolls or bringer of death.
